Articles.Content:
I can't believe I managed to go this far. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Rg7t1CxgYSQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Check out Kuzzter's challenge.

[Evel Kerbivel's Minmus Rover Jump Off Challenge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112708-Evel-Kerbievel-s-Minmus-Rover-Jump-Off-Challenge)

Just pulled of a 2.0 kilometer jump a few minutes ago. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Maybe I can do more. I've gotta shed some weight and redo that ramp.
